string-array.name: acd_appsugg_moreinfo
string-array.item: The user gets to select a type of dice and then roll it to get a result. It is very helpful for people who play DnD games or those who rely on chance to make decisions.
The user makes daily habits they want to develop. They can set reminders to remind themself to check the habit off their list for the day. The list resets at midnight in their local time.
This widget allows users to check their grades on their home screen without having to open their school app.
This app allows users to generate random prompts from a dictionary to use for AI generators (for instance, Dall-E image generator).

resources.string: CS and DET Student at ACU

An app to track things such as workouts, studying, diet etc... and provides players with a stats sheet just like those that can be found in RPGs. The idea is to get people that would normally invest a lot of time on leveling up a virtual character to spend some time leveling themselves up
An app to search the area around you to find churches in the area and provide you with basic information to get connected

Interactive Mythological Tree which allows you to select a pantheon and then learn which gods were supposed to affect which aspects of life such as love, agriculture, war, and so on, while also providing their family trees and possibly the backgrounds/origins of the individual gods.
Abilene alone has over 30 nail bars. This proposes an issue women face: Which one has the shortest wait?
NailTime would allow nail bars to post their wait times which would clear waiting rooms, boost business, and accommodate the customer.

The Risky World App is an Accounting Website idea, designed by my father and developed by me, is a accounting database system keeping track of general information, parameters, catalogs, and users from different departments inside a company from Honduras.

This app is fully dynamic, where administrators can add, delete or change information constantly by accessing their accounts, modifying records and assigning tasks to several other administrators and users.

Risky World is an accountability prototype system architecture designed to implement basic security to several roles for users, implement basic parameters and functionalities in the applications, building registration, wholesale in accounting items and a clean and integral financial status for the company.

I wanted to elaborate more on the apps I thought about creating. The inventors app is an app where inventors can post new ideas and request funds, material, and assistance. The Snack Raid app is an app that keeps track of the snackage in your house and has a randomizer if you dont know what to snack on. Lastly, have you ever wanted to capatilize..I mean spread the new online age of dating? Why spend over a hundred dollars on a cheap bluetooth LED when you can spend 1 dollar on a cheap piece of software! With Couple Buttons, you can now instagate (that means start) conversations with your partner. Simply register thier phone number as well as your own, create your buttons, and chat with the ease of a simple push.

List Maker is a super customizable list creator. There will be one main view where you can add "categories" to it. A category can have another category added to it, or a list. A list is comprised of a bunch of smaller items that can be given a priority, a date, and have reminders set on it for notifications. The main view can have categories and lists added to it so you can see only lists in the category for "school", or perhaps only one list for when you go shopping. This is to get the best parts of the inheritance system (where we can store categories and lists inside of other categories for organizational purposes), while also being able to show multiple lists at the same time (say, multiple classes for school). The items shown in the main view can be sorted by priority, due date, reminder date, or alphabetically (and any other types of sorting things that might be helpful.

RPG Life is an app about taking real life progress and turning it into something more quantifiable. Users will be able to add types of work and prescribe it to a particular stat (strength, intelligence, dexterity, etc.). This will improve their stats and they will be able to have numbers to display actual growth to motivate people for their progress.

What I planned on having for the livestream app is allowing the app to have web extension. Other competitors don\'t have the web extension features resulting mobile users missing out on the fun of raid or chat spam. Extentions like 7TV and BetterTV allows certain word to become GIF or picture.
